## General Sub Badge
```{r general-sub-badge}
set.seed(10)
general_sub_data <-
  data.frame(x = seq(1:20))
general_sub_data$y <- 
  general_sub_data$x + 
  runif(n = length(general_sub_data$x),
        max = 5)


ggplot2::ggplot(data = general_sub_data,
                mapping = ggplot2::aes(x = x, 
                                       y = y)) +
  ggplot2::geom_line(color = bold_pal[["Sapphire Blue"]],
                     size = 10) +
  ggplot2::geom_text(mapping = ggplot2::aes(x = 10,
                                            y = 14,
                                            label = ("1")),
                     size = 120) +
  ggplot2::theme_classic() +
  ggplot2::theme(axis.text = ggplot2::element_blank(),
                 axis.title = ggplot2::element_blank(),
                 axis.line = ggplot2::element_line(size = 5),
                 panel.background = 
                   ggplot2::element_rect(fill = pastel_pal[["Baby Powder"]]))
```

# Two Month Sub Badge
```{r two-month, options}
set.seed(10)
two_month_sub_data <-
  data.frame(x = rep(seq(1:20), 3),
             type = c(rep(1, 20), rep(2, 20), rep(3, 20)))
two_month_sub_data$y <- 
  two_month_sub_data$x + 
  runif(n = length(two_month_sub_data$x),
        max = 5)
```
